DOC.brief_summary: This open-labelled randomized cross-over control exploratory intervention aim include 20-30 patient ileostomy . Every patient test two new ostomy appliance two week . During test questionaire fill interview take place . Primary parameter leakage . A Study nurse visit participant home every two week test .
DOC.brief_title: A Clinical Investigation New Ostomy Appliances
DOC.criteria: 1 . Age > 18 year . 2 . Have ileostomy 3 month . 3 . Have use convex product last 1 month . 4 . Has give write Informed Consent . 5 . Have ileostomy diameter 15 33 mm . 6 . Have inward peristomal area 1 . Have loop ostomy 2 . Pregnant breastfeeding . 3 . Known allergy towards product component ingredient . 4 . Currently receive within last 2 month receive radio and/or chemotherapy . 5 . Currently receive within past month receive local systemic steroid treatment peristomal area . 6 . Currently suffer peristomal skin problem ( i.e . bleeding red broken skin )
